They took everything wonderful about Portal and turned it up to 11! The dialogue is some of the funniest I've ever heard in a video game. The villains crack me up and the puzzle aspect of the game can be a real mind burner. The 2 player co-op is some of the most interesting video game fun I've had with a 2nd person in years.

Одна из лучших игр-головоломок (да и вообще игр) в принципе! Ещё с детства мне понравилась первая часть серии, которая проходилась всего за час-полтора. Здесь же всё отполировано фактически до ИДЕАЛА : графика, и по сей день радующая глаз (игре более 8 лет), интересный сюжет, харизматичные и запоминающиеся герои(пускай их и здесь не много), достаточно интересный кооператив. В наши дни достаточно много игр выходит с хорошим сюжетом, красивой графикой, интересными персонажами, но при всем этом эта игра остаётся конкурентоспособной. Для меня это 10 из 10.

The first Portal was amazing don't get me wrong, but this one has such an amazing story and it's so much longer so you can actually grind it and follow the story. i played a little bit of this game years ago when i was really little but never beat it. i started playing this again and between the time from the end of february , to the end of march i sunk in 50 hours of this game. literally can't give it up i have beat the game at least 12 times and still going. so if you're thinking of getting this, seriously get it and play it. take your time and follow the story and it will become one of your favorite games.

Portal serisi (Sadece 2 oyun olsa da) mizahı ve bulmacalarıyla beni içine öyle bir çekiyor ki vaktin nasıl geçtiğini anlamıyor insan.Bu mizah ve bulmacaların yanında bir de final şarkıları var ki (özellikle ilk oyunun "Still Alive" şarkısı beni benden almıştı.) bitirince gerçekten bitirdiğinizi hissettiriyor.İlk oyuna kıyasla bu oyunu daha hızlı bitirdim gibime geldi ama bunun co-op modu da var ve eğer oynayacak arkadaşınız varsa çok keyifli dakikalar geçirebilirsiniz.Oyunun metacritic puanı zaten 95 ama benim için bu oyun bulmaca türünde bakarsak 100/100.

This is a wonderful game for anyone who is into the puzzle genre. It has amazing characters, witty dialogue, and puzzle setups that aren't too vague as to what you need to do, but also not too obvious that it's no fun. This game can be a little disorienting with how your point of reference can be switched up as you throw yourself around through portals, but otherwise there isn't anything too newcomer unfriendly. I suppose one thing to keep in mind is that this game does NOT give you any hints as to how you're supposed to solve the puzzles. You have to use what the game gives you, look around, pick up on hints, and most of all, be patient. A good puzzle requires time and effort to be solved. So if you are looking to work your way through various mind exercising puzzles, enjoy a simple yet delightful story, a unique and enjoyable cooperative mode, and a series of online user made levels, then this game is perfect for you.

This was a triumph.
I'm making a review here:
HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.

Reviewing Gamers.
We do what we must because we can.
For the good of all of us
Except the ones who are CoD squeakers.

But there's no sense crying over every graphic pixel.
You just keep on trying till you run out of reasons.
And the review gets done and you make a neat point.
For the people who are not CoD squeakers.

I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though I read bad reviews, they killed me...
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every brain cell into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for Portal!

Now these points of data make a beautiful review.
And we're out of beta, we're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
For the people who are not CoD squeakers.

Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to play portal.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Electronic Arts...
THAT WAS A JOKE. Haha. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this game is great.
It's so awesome and fresh.

Look at me still talking when there's playing to do.
When I play portal it makes me GLaD I'm not a CoD squeaker.
I've game time to run there is playing to be done
On the people who are not CoD squeakers

And believe me I am still playing.
I'm playing portal and I'm still playing.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still playing.
While you're squeaking I'll be still playing.
And when you're dead I will be still playing.

Still playing
